name: Totally Spies! Totally Party
overview: The world is under constant threat from supervillains, megalomaniacs, and all-around badguys. To keep the peace, you'll need courage, cunning, and stylish flats! Totally Spies! Totally Party brings the fun of the hit series to the Wii in a zany 3-player party game. Chase villains across 10 colorful gameboards while competing in outrageous mini-games, setting traps, and deploying clever spy gadgets. Along the way, you'll unlock hot new clothes for each spy. Wear them in-game, or dress for success in a glamorous catwalk beat-game. You'll need style and grace to rule the fashion world! Features: • Compete in 30 outrageous mini-games • Traverse 10 game boards, with themes from the show • Unlock tons of new clothes for each spy • Rock the catwalk by dressing up and strutting with confidence
